name: Betrayal and Manipulation
description:
Rebels are gathering at night to organize a Coup in the city!

But the Inspector has spies in every street that will send him Tips through Letters on the next day.

Your job is to Manipulate the Letters so the accusations don't hit the Rebels.

Gameplay:

Select a building with a Letter to use the Letters Stamps or a building with a Rebel to use the Tip Stamp so the Rebels (Portraits with Green framing) are not hit by the accusations (Red Buildings).

When you are done with your Actions you can Press Send to end the turn.

You can see wich Letters hit a building by selecting it, and wich Buildings are hit by letters by selecting a building with a Letter.

If a Rebel is hit by Three Accusations he is Arrested.

If Two Rebels are Arrested you Lose.

Survive 10 Days with at least 2 Rebels to Succeed!

Some bugs may happen in edge cases, i'll try to update through this week!

Credits:
